name: Games are So Much Fun! (She Wrote)
name_original: Games are So Much Fun! (She Wrote)
description:
Games are So Much Fun! You are Ardra, a girl that enters a game, and it is her life, but happier!

It is a really short game, with a cute/disturbing little story

This is the recreation of the second game I ever finished, “Games are So Much Fun”. You play as Ardra, she is adorable and has learning disabilities, so play nice, don’t mock her name for being weird. Say that it is cool that her name is the same backwards and forwards. I also probably should say that this game is a tiny bit disturbing and violent… and weird. Don’t play this if you are a child.

Some pause menus in games can be really great, if you are going to quit the game make sure you use Esc, do not press alt-F4, or close in any other way.
